description: Configure various aspects of how document naming works like naming series, current counter.

fields.description: Set Naming Series options on your transactions.
fields.label: Setup Series for transactions
fields.name: setup_series

fields.label: Help HTML
fields.options:
Edit list of Series in the box. Rules:
  • Each Series Prefix on a new line.
  • Allowed special characters are "/" and "-"
  • Optionally, set the number of digits in the series using dot (.) followed by hashes (#). For example, ".####" means that the series will have four digits. Default is five digits.
  • You can also use variables in the series name by putting them between (.) dots
    Supported Variables:
    • .YYYY. - Year in 4 digits
    • .YY. - Year in 2 digits
    • .MM. - Month
    • .DD. - Day of month
    • .WW. - Week of the year
    • .FY. - Fiscal Year
    • .ABBR. - Company Abbreviation
    • .{fieldname}. - fieldname on the document e.g. branch
Examples:
  • INV-
  • INV-10-
  • INVK-
  • INV-.YYYY.-.{branch}.-.MM.-.####
fields.name: help_html

fields.description: Check this if you want to force the user to select a series before saving. There will be no default if you check this.
fields.label: User must always select
fields.name: user_must_always_select

fields.description:
Change the starting / current sequence number of an existing series.
Warning: Incorrectly updating counters can prevent documents from getting created.
fields.label: Update Series Counter
fields.name: update_series

fields.description: This is the number of the last created transaction with this prefix
fields.label: Current Value
fields.name: current_value

fields.description: Get a preview of generated names with a series.
fields.label: Try a Naming Series
fields.name: try_naming_series

fields.description:
Configure how amended documents will be named.
Default behaviour is to follow an amend counter which adds a number to the end of the original name indicating the amended version.
Default Naming will make the amended document to behave same as new documents.
fields.label: Amended Documents
fields.name: amended_documents_section
